Name: Vreal
About the game: Vreal puts you in control of how you want to experience gaming content. Have you ever wanted to watch a GORN fight from the stands, or find all the secret weapons in SUPERHOT? Watch immersive content from top creators from anywhere inside the game. Creating content is easy: play the game and hit publish to share your gaming experiences with friends. Vreal is in Early Access and we’re very responsive to feedback. Have a question or a feature idea? Is there a game we MUST add to Vreal? Join our Discord to chat with us; we’d love to hear from you!
